description:
If you thought your school was a zoo, wait till you see what Pascal-sensei has brought to class today! Meanwhile, a young ruler finds the courage to stand up for himself, and Chika tests her observational skills.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danger! Keep Out! Zoo Classroom / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Hairuna Kiken! Doubutsu Kyoushitsu / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
入るなキケン! 動物教室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
